title: Tech4BrandonJohnson
welcomeText:
# Sign the Petition In Support of Brandon Johnson, Future Mayor of the City of Chicago. Wanna get involved in the good fight and block his far-right affiliated white supremacist opposition from upholding the same systemic issue shit? Help build some tech while you're at it. Feel free to contribute to any of these open-source repos. The Chicago Mayoral Runoff Election is on April 4th, 2023. Let's get to work. -- Signed, Jillian Somera, Your Friendly, Neighborhood Election Coordinator for the City of Chicago and citizen of the 32nd Ward ðŸ’™
